document.full_text: lasith malinga and shaun tait have given up other forms of cricket to concentrate on twenty20, and they are dominating the indian premier league with their unorthodox styles.
document.title: cricket: 2 bowlers find success with a flair all their own
lines_and_colors: lasith malinga and shaun tait have given up other forms of cricket to concentrate on twenty20, and they are dominating the indian premier league with their unorthodox styles.
